summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2359 for the improvement of Eighteenth Avenue Northeast and Nineteenth Avenue Northeast, each from East Sixty-fifth Street to East Seventy-fifth Street, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues therein named, all in The City of Seattle, by grading and curbing the same, and providing for the necessary surface and sub-drainage, together with the necessary wooden crosswalks; under Ordinance No. 24541, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
